title: WTA International, Istanbul (Women) Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: April 27, 2018 / 6:39 PM / Updated 41 minutes ago WTA International, Istanbul (Women) Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Apr 27 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the WTA International, Istanbul (Women) Women's Singles matches on Friday .. Final Rounds ..
